inclusion.criterion: obstetric patients aged 18 or more years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: post-dural puncture headache (PDPH) after a confirmed or likely unintentional dural puncture
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: medically suitable for and have consented to epidural blood patch (EBP) for treatment of PDPH
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous epidural blood patch (EBP) related to the same unintentional dural puncture
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of significant low or radicular back pain during pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
